# PHYS 211 Newtonian Physics

![xkcd: Centrifugal force](https://imgs.xkcd.com/comics/centrifugal_force.png)

From [xkcd.com](https://xkcd.com/123/)

## Course Description

A rigorous study of Newtonian mechanics. Beginning with Newton's laws, the concepts of energy, momentum, and angular momentum are developed and applied to gravitational, harmonic, and rigid-body motions.

Normally offered every year, fall

## Prerequisites

MATH 106 and PHYS 107 or 109.
